scripts.build: yarn build:clean-state && yarn build:counter && yarn build:cross-contract-call && yarn build:fungible-token-lockable && yarn build:fungible-token && yarn build:non-fungible-token && yarn build:status-message-collections && yarn build:status-message
scripts.rebuild: cd .. && yarn build && cd examples && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf build && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:cross-contract-call: near-sdk build src/status-message.js build/status-message.wasm && near-sdk build src/cross-contract-call.js build/cross-contract-call.wasm
scripts.build:non-fungible-token: near-sdk build src/test-token-receiver.js build/test-token-receiver.wasm && near-sdk build src/non-fungible-token.js build/non-fungible-token.wasm
